title: League ranking
body: If I make a brand new account and get to level 30, when I play my first ranked matches, how does it rank me? Is it an always bronze even if you get like 10 straight wins or what? What is the highest you can be ranked(I am still talking about with the brand new level 30 first ranked placement matches ever), etc. Any help is appreciated  $$$$ heres money 4 u
